Name: Sites in the Arctic Holocene Biodiversity Database
Description: Note. This dataset is not complete, as work is ongoing.
PublicationReference: Martin, A.C., Assmann, J.J., Bradshaw, R.H.W., Kuoppamaa, M., Kuosmanen, N.I., Normand, S., Speed, J.D.M., Macias- Fauria, M., 2022. What evidence exists for temporal variability in Arctic terrestrial and freshwater biodiversity throughout the Holocene? A systematic map protocol. Environ Evid 11, 13 (2022).

BaseLayers.Name: Bioclimate Subzones
BaseLayers.Description: Arctic zonation defined by the Circumpolar Arctic Vegetation Atlas.

BaseLayers.Name: Boundary for Conservation of Arctic Flora and Fauna (CAFF) working group of the Arctic Council
BaseLayers.Description: The area covered by the the Conservation of Arctic Flora and Fauna (CAFF) working group of the Arctic Council

Fields.Name: Types of biotic proxy applied
Fields.Description: A broad label for the types of biotic proxies used to infer biodiversity change over time.

Fields.Name: Authors / Investigators
Fields.Description: Persons involved with the production of the source.

Fields.Name: Nature of publication
Fields.Description: Indicates whether the source of the information is published or unpublished, and through which method.

Fields.Name: Taxon (inferred as)
Fields.Description: The taxon / taxa that the biotic proxy has been inferred as.

Fields.Name: Biotic Proxy (inferred from)
Fields.Description: The biotic proxy that was recorded, from which a true taxon / taxa have been inferred.

Fields.Name: Inference method
Fields.Description: The inference method used to connect the biotic proxy to a true taxon / taxa.

Fields.Name: Biodiversity Dimension
Fields.Description: The dimension of biodiversity (or 'measure') interpreted from the biotic proxy.

Fields.Name: Origin of Sample
Fields.Description: The parent material from which the biodiversity measure was observed.

Fields.Name: Temporal Extent of Biodiversity Time-Series
Fields.Description: The temporal extent (range) of each biodiversity time-series in the AHBDB. Dates are as reported by the authors / sources on a common cal yr BP timescale.

Fields.Name: Air Temperature
Fields.Description: The temperature at any point in the time-series, as given by CHELSA. CHELSA data is at 100-year temporal resolution.

Fields.Name: Annual Precipitation Sum
Fields.Description: The annual precipitation sum at any point in the time-series, as modelled by CHELSA. CHELSA data is at 100-year temporal resolution.

Fields.Name: Distance to ice (on land)
Fields.Description: The range of distances between the biodiversity time-series' location and the nearest ice on land during its existence, as modelled by CHELSA. CHELSA data is at 100-year temporal resolution.

Fields.Name: Elevation change over temporal extent
Fields.Description: Given a biodiversity time-series, the change in elevation between the start time and end time (as modelled by CHELSA). CHELSA data is at 100-year temporal resolution.

Fields.Name: Temperature Variability
Fields.Description: The difference between the maximum and minimum temperature during the time series

Fields.Name: Annual Precipitation Sum Variability
Fields.Description: The difference between the maximum and minimum precipitation sum during the time series

Fields.Name: Publication Year
Fields.Description: The year in which the source was published. Note: only displays published sources.
